Apple___Apple_scab.description: Apple is a disease in Apple scab. It affects the plant's health and yield.
Apple___Apple_scab.cure: Remove infected parts and dispose of them properly. Maintain plant hygiene.
Apple___Apple_scab.organic_solution: Apply neem oil, compost tea, or baking soda spray as a natural remedy.
Apple___Apple_scab.chemical_solution: Use recommended fungicides or pesticides as per agricultural guidelines.
Apple___Apple_scab.preventive_measures: Practice crop rotation, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead watering, and use disease-resistant varieties.
